items.name: Apple Pie
items.description: The crispy, flaky pie crust and sweet apples are a match made in heaven.

items.name: Carrot Cake
items.description: Even those who don't like carrots tend to enjoy the mild sweetness of this cake.

items.name: Egg Pudding
items.description: Made by cooking eggs and milk in a special mold, its soft texture melts in your mouth.

items.name: Egg Tart
items.description: You'll know this simple dessert is done baking when it smells just delightful.

items.name: Fish Pie
items.description: A mainstay in any fisherman's home, the crisp crust pairs well with the fishy flavor.

items.name: Carrot Stew
items.description: This simple stew sat simmering for a long time to bring out the sweetness of the carrots.

items.name: Crab Omelet with Rice
items.description: The fluffy crab legs pair perfectly with the rice for a truly scrumptious dish.

items.name: Crab Risotto
items.description: An everyday stable of seaside villages, the secret to its delicious flavor lies in crab fat.

items.name: Crab Stir-Fry
items.description: The Goron spice used in preparing this crab pairs perfectly with the flavor of the meat.

items.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
items.description: The creamy mushroom and vegetable soup is so chunky it eats like a meal!

items.name: Cream of Vegetable Soup
items.description: Made by simmering vegetables in milk, this healthy dish is as simple as the ingredients.
ingredients: Any Vegetable, Herb or Flower (except carrots or pumpkin)

items.name: Creamy Heart Soup
items.description: Enjoying this sweet soup with another person will bring you both closer together.

items.name: Creamy Meat Soup
items.description: This nutritious soup contains serious portions of lightly-braised meat and many vegetables.

items.name: Creamy Seafood Soup
items.description: Thuck-cut chunks of seafood and stock provides a satisfying savoriness.

items.name: Curry Pilaf
items.description: The goron spice used in this pilaf has given it a rich, spicy aroma.

items.name: Curry Rice
items.description: A favorite all over Hyrule, this simple dish has a flavor you just won't get tired of.

items.name: Dubious Food
items.description: It's too gross to even look at. A bizarre smell issues forth from this heap. Eating it won't hurt you though...probably.
ingredients: Food with critters or monster parts, or

items.name: Energizing Glazed Meat
items.description: The sweetness of the honey permeates the meat, giving it a complex taste profile.

items.name: Energizing Honey Candy
items.description: A natural sweet, brimming with nutrition and made by stewing fresh honey.

items.name: Energizing Honeyed Apple
items.description: A juicy sweet-and-sour dish combining newly ripened apples with honey.

items.name: Fish Skewer
items.description: A simple dish made by cooking chunks of fresh fish on a skewer.

items.name: Copious Fish Skewers
items.description: It's just a whole heap of stuff shoved on to a skewer, but it's still a pretty tasty dish.

items.name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer
items.description: A simple dish made by cooking skewered, fresh fish alongside fragrant mushrooms.

items.name: Fragrant Mushroom Sauté
items.description: The fragrant aroma of this sautéed spice and mushroom dish makes your mouth water.

items.name: Fried Bananas
items.description: Children love fried mighty bananas. The trick is frying them over very high heat.

items.name: Fried Egg and Rice
items.description: The soft egg yolk pairs well with the fresh rice in this simple dish.

items.name: Fried Wild Greens
items.description: A basic vegetable dish made by sautéing fresh wild plants.

items.name: Copious Fried Wild Greens
items.description: A healthy dish made by cooking mixed greens over a strong flame.
ingredients: Any 4 different Vegetables, Herbs, or Flowers

items.name: Fruit and Mushroom Mix
items.description: This dish contrasts the sweetness of fruit with the savoriness of mushrooms.

items.name: Fruit Pie
items.description: A celebration isn't a celebration until this fruit-filled crust hits the table!

items.name: Fruitcake
items.description: Making ample use of fruits found all over Hyrule, this cake is a must for celebrations.

items.name: Glazed Mushrooms
items.description: The honey in this mushroom dish gives it a sweet, complex taste and a savory finish.

items.name: Glazed Seafood
items.description: A seafood dish that you can actually wolf down whole!

items.name: Glazed Veggies
items.description: Don't like the taste of vegetables? Simply sauté them in honey for a salty-sweet flavor!

items.name: Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl

image.description: Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl Icon

items.description: Only the most carefully selected cuts of high-quality meats go into this dish.

items.name: Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry

image.description: Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry Icon

items.description: A marriage of the choicest cuts of meat and seafood. As delicious as it is filling!

items.name: Gourmet Meat Curry
items.description: The high-quality meat used in this prized dish satisfies meat and curry lovers alike.

items.name: Gourmet Meat Stew
items.description: The meat has simmered for so long it melts in your mouth. A true bucket-list meal!

items.name: Gourmet Poultry Curry
items.description: Once served in Hyrule Castle, the poultry used in this dish is of immensely high quality.

items.name: Gourmet Poultry Pilaf
items.description: Made with the highest-quality poultry, every bite of this pilaf floods your mouth with flavor.

items.name: Gourmet Spiced Meat Skewer
items.description: The rich aroma and juicy texture of this high-quality meat puts it in a league of its own.

items.name: Hearty Clam Chowder
items.description: The nutritional value of hearty blueshell snail combines with butter and milk in a rich soup.

items.name: Hearty Salmon Muenière
items.description: The crispy skin of this fried hearty salmon puts its texture in a class all its own.

items.name: Herb Sauté
items.description:
A fragrant mixture of herbs and spices.
It's easily recognized by its unique aroma.

items.name: Honey Crepe
items.description: Honey has been drizzled over thin crepes to bring out their natural sweetness and flavor.

items.name: Honeyed Fruits
items.description: A dish that combines the thick sweetness of honey with the acidity of sour fruits.

items.name: Hot Buttered Apple
items.description: The apple's sweetness has been enhanced by smothering it with butter and baking it.

items.name: Meat and Mushroom Skewer
items.description: A filling dish made by grilling various mountain ingredients with either Steak or Bird Meat.

items.name: Meat and Rice Bowl
items.description: This dish of rice and lightly seared meat is a mainstay all throughout Hyrule.

items.name: Meat and Seafood Fry
items.description: A filling dish made by cooking fresh seafood and meat together.

items.name: Meat Curry
items.description: The heat from the spice allows you to enjoy the large portion of the meat's savoriness.

items.name: Meat Pie
items.description: You'll need an extra napkin to deal with this juicy pie of perfectly baked minced meat.

items.name: Meat Skewer
items.description: A juicy, filling snack made by grilling small chunks of meat on a skewer.

items.name: Copious Meat Skewers
items.description: Just shove a bunch of meat on to a skewer and you're good to go.

items.name: Meat Stew
items.description: The hearty meat in this mainstay dish leaves bellies satisfied all throughout Hyrule.
ingredients: Raw Meat or Raw Bird Drumstick

items.name: Meaty Rice Balls
items.description: The sweet and spicy meat stuffed into these rice balls will keep you full for some time.

items.name: Monster Cake
items.description: It's said that once you have a taste of this cake, you'll never forget its sweetness.

items.name: Monster Curry
items.description: This unusual take on curry uses monster extract and doesn't rely on spices.

items.name: Monster Rice Balls
items.description: Rice balls flavored with monster extract. Their unique aroma is not for everyone.

items.name: Monster Soup
items.description: Using monster extract as a base, this soup's distinct gaminess is either loved or hated.

items.name: Monster Stew
items.description: Meat and seafood simmered in monster extract. A savory dish despite its ingredients.

items.name: Mushroom Omelet
items.description: The fluffy texture of this omelet is one of the great joys of this dish, as well as life.

items.name: Mushroom Rice Balls
items.description: The aroma of the mushrooms tickles your nose as you peel back the leafy wrapping.

items.name: Mushroom Risotto
items.description: The tantalizing aroma of mushrooms and butter beckons you to the table.

items.name: Mushroom Skewer
items.description: This simple mushroom-packed skewer has its colorful presentation to thank for its appeal.

items.name: Copious Mushrooms Skewers
items.description: Fans of fungal cuisine can't resist this simple mushroom-skewer dish. Very filling.

items.name: Nutcake
items.description: Forest nuts give this cake a pleasant texture and a simple, understated sweetness.

items.name: Omelet
items.description: This simple dish is common all over Hyrule. Simply fry egg until it's nice and plump.

items.name: Pepper Seafood
items.description: The pepper seeds grilled with this seafood draw out its taste and pleasant aroma.

items.name: Plain Crepe
items.description: The simplicity of this dish lets the flavor of its ingredients shine.

items.name: Porgy Meunière
items.description: Popular among residents of coastal regions, this juicy porgy is a delish dish.

items.name: Poultry Curry
items.description: The savory meat pairs well with the aroma of spice in this common curry.

items.name: Poultry Pilaf
items.description: Sautéed Hylian rice steamed in poultry broth. Cook on low heat until the rice is fluffy.

items.name: Prime Meat and Rice Bowl

image.description: Prime Meat and Rice Bowl Icon

items.description: This bowl is loaded with high-quality meat. Your hunt for a serious meal ends here.

items.name: Prime Meat and Seafood Fry

image.description: Prime Meat and Seafood Fry Icon

items.description: This comfort dish is made with choice cuts of meat and seafood.

items.name: Prime Meat Curry
items.description: The high-quality meat in this curry has given it a deeper taste than most other curries.

items.name: Prime Meat Stew
items.description: Letting the large portions of choice cuts of meat simmer brought out their savoriness.

items.name: Prime Poultry Curry
items.description: The secret to this curry's flavor is taking it off the heat while you add the spices.

items.name: Prime Poultry Pilaf
items.description: The rice permeates the savory taste of the poultry in this Gerudo-region favorite.

items.name: Prime Spiced Meat Skewer
items.description: The simple preparation of this steak dish belies its complex taste profile.

items.name: Pumpkin Pie
items.description: The intense sweetness of fortified pumpkins makes this dessert popular among children.

items.name: Pumpkin Stew
items.description: Simply simmer a fortified pumpkin to make this dish. A favorite in Kakariko Village.

items.name: Rock-Hard Food
items.description: A dish gone awry after adding the wrong ingredient. Chewing your way through this won't be fun, but it will fill you up when you're between a rock and a hard place.

items.name: Salmon Risotto
items.description: The rice used in this rich risotto permeates the light flavor of the salmon.

items.name: Salt-Grilled Crab
items.description: Nine out of ten fishermen agree: crab is best enjoyed grilled and with just a bit of salt.

items.name: Salt-Grilled Fish
items.description: A simple dish made by rolling a whole fish in natural rock salt before grilling it.

items.name: Salt-Grilled Gourmet Meat
items.description: This lavish grilled dish makes liberal use of high-quality cuts of meat.

items.name: Salt-Grilled Greens
items.description: A health-boosting dish made with leafy greens and a touch of salt.

items.name: Salt-Grilled Meat
items.description: Short on ingredients? Just rub some meat in salt and cook it for a simple, tasty dish.
ingredients: Raw Meat or Raw Bird Drumstick

items.name: Salt-Grilled Mushrooms
items.description: A basic mushroom dish made by lightly salting mushrooms and grilling them.

items.name: Salt-Grilled Prime Meat
items.description: A simple yet exquisite dish made by grilling high-quality meat on top of rock salt.

items.name: Sautéed Nuts
items.description: These sautéed tree seeds are the perfect snack for the busy adventurer on the go!

items.name: Seafood Curry
items.description: This dish brims with treasures from the sea. Its spice packs a kick, so it's not for kids.
ingredients: Hearty Blueshell Snail or Any Porgy

items.name: Seafood Fried Rice
items.description: Various seafood has been sautéed with rice. The stronger the flame, the tastier the dish!
ingredients: Hearty Blueshell Snail or Any Porgy

items.name: Seafood Meunière
items.description: Rich butter flanks fresh seafood. The secret ingredient is lots and lots of love.

items.name: Seafood Paella
items.description: No fisherman's birthday bash would be complete without this top-shelf seafood dish.

items.name: Seafood Rice Balls
items.description: Stuffed with aromatic seafood, the flavor can vary by ingredients but never disappoints.

items.name: Seafood Skewer
items.description: The natural water in this medley of seafaring creatures makes for a delicious broth.

items.name: Simmered Fruit
items.description: This sweet dish is made by heaping tasty fruits into a pan and simmering until tender.

items.name: Copious Simmered Fruit
items.description: The flavors of the various fruits in this simmered dish exist in perfect harmony.

items.name: Spiced Meat Skewer
items.description: A special Goron spice covers up the scent of the meat, allowing its flavor to shine.

items.name: Spicy Pepper Steak
items.description: A dish made by cooking meat in crushed peppers, suppressing the gamy taste while accentuating its flavor.

items.name: Spicy Sautéed Peppers
items.description: The spiciness of these sautéed peppers has been broken by the heat for a sweeter taste.

items.name: Steamed Fish
items.description: A refined dish made by wrapping a fresh fish in fragrant wild greens and cooking it.

items.name: Steamed Fruit
items.description: A regional dish made by steaming near-ripened fruits in the leaves of fragrant plants.

items.name: Steamed Meat
items.description: This meat dish has been wrapped in fragrant leaves and steamed to preserve its moisture.
ingredients: Any Vegetable, Herb, or Flower (except Pumpkin)

items.name: Steamed Mushroom
items.description: A healthy vegetable dish achieved by steaming mushrooms in plant leaves.

items.name: Tough Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin
items.description: Grants a low-level defense boost. This hollow, meat-filled fortified pumpkin is a local specialty or Kakariko Village.

items.name: Vegetable Curry
items.description: This healthy curry is popular for its mild flavor and moderate spiciness.

items.name: Vegetable Omelet
items.description: This home-style dish mixes fluffy eggs with chopped vegetables for nutritional balance.

items.name: Vegetable Risotto
items.description: The sweetness of the ingredients gives this risotto a mild flavor.

items.name: Veggie Cream Soup
items.description: This creamy soup showcases the sweetness of vegetables in a veritable taste explosion.

items.name: Veggie Rice Balls
items.description: This home-style dish of Kakariko Village is stuffed with the bounty of the mountains.

items.name: Warm Milk
items.description: Make this by heating up some milk. Drink it before bed to ensure a good night's sleep.

items.name: Wheat Bread
items.description: Made with wheat from the Tabantha region, this soft, springy bread smells just heavenly.

items.name: Wildberry Crepe
items.description: Sweet, tart wildberries are folded into thin, springy dough to make this dessert.
